data.title: Meta removes accounts linked to Mexican drug cartels using platforms for recruitment
data.snippet: Meta's Dangerous Organizations team takes down networks used by cartels to recruit members and intimidate communities across Mexico.

data.title: European intelligence agencies warn of far-right extremist networks growing online
data.snippet: A coordinated assessment by EU intelligence services identifies 40+ organized far-right groups actively recruiting through gaming platforms and forums.

data.title: India bans 12 organizations under UAPA for promoting separatism and violence
data.snippet: The Ministry of Home Affairs designates a dozen organizations as unlawful associations under the Unlawful Activities Prevention Act.

data.title: TikTok removes 3 million videos glorifying gang activity in 2025
data.snippet: TikTok's annual enforcement report shows massive-scale removal of content promoting dangerous organizations including street gangs and militias.

data.title: Boko Haram splinter groups expand digital propaganda operations in West Africa
data.snippet: Security analysts track new digital propaganda campaigns by ISWAP and other Boko Haram offshoots targeting youth across Nigeria and neighboring countries.
